article.title: MECTS to Support Persistent Ground Surveillance System
article.text: MECTS Services Joint Venture, Fairfax, Virginia, is being awarded a $16,283,732 modification to a previously awarded cost-plus-fixed-fee contract (N68335-13-C-0292) to exercise an option for logistic services and spare/repair parts in support of the Persistent Ground Surveillance System. The Naval Air Warfare Center Aircraft Division, Lakehurst, New Jersey, is the contracting activity.
